item.title: Market Basket Analysis of Computer Accessory Purchases
item.description: Market Basket Analysis of Computer Accessory Purchases Description This project aimed to uncover purchasing patterns and associations between computer accessories using Market Basket Analysis (MBA). I applied the Apriori algorithm to a dataset of customer transactions from an online computer retailer.
